title: The exit menu doesn't work
content:
Hello, I have the problem that when trying to exit the browser using the 'Exit' option from the menu (the menu that opens when you press the button with 3 horizontal lines in the top right corner of the browser) it doesn't work, it's not even clickable. When I hover over it with the mouse, the hover effect is visible, but clicking it does absolutely nothing.

Despite this, the other alternatives for closing the browser still work:

  • Ctrl + q
  • Clicking the 'x' on the window
  • Alt + F4

What causes this problem? Is there a solution?

Regards, and thank you very much in advance.
creator: JMB

title: YouTube keeps crashing in version 126 64bit
content:
When scrolling down through the YouTube home page, the current tab will crash and end up as a small window near the bottom right of the screen with a totally blacked out screen in that small window.

Only solution is to close that little window and open YouTube in a new tab... which will eventually crash the same way.

I have disabled the tracking shield for Youtube.com Problems are even worse with the tracking shield enabled.

These type of problems started with version 125. I hoped things would be resolved with 126 but problems still persist. Other websites have issues as well. Mostly with image displays such as on carfax.com when trying to view photos of cars with their photo scroller widget.

I'm not having these problems with the Edge browser.
creator: dee_veloper

title: Address bar search results floating over address bar and tabs
creator: josh.glottmann

title: Nefunkcionalnost
content:
Že v to povezavo sem imel neizmerne probleme... Čakanje cca. 3-4 minute !

Kjerkoli na internetu se nahajam imam velike probleme...

Tako z prenašanjem , kot tudi z vsakršno koli povezovanjem na internetu potom Mozille.

Medtem , ko sem na drugih inernetnih podundninkih (Google Chrome in Microsoft Edge) teh težav ne zaznavam in mi vse deluje normalno.

Torej !

Ali imate namen v tej smeri kaj izboljšati , ali pa bo tako , kot pač je ?!

Lep pozdrav od vašega dolgo letnega člana.


Karlo Perhavec
creator: draggmetohell
